ARABIC: لَّقَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ فِى رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُسْوَةٌ حَسَنَةٌ لِّمَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلْءَاخِرَ وَذَكَرَ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You have an excellent model in the Messenger of Allah, for all who put their hope in Allah and the Last Day and remember Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You have indeed a noble paradigm in the Apostle of God for him who fears God and the Day of Resurrection, and remembers God frequently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely there was a good example for you in the Messenger of Allah, for all those who look forward to Allah and the Last Day and remember Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Messenger of God is certainly a good example for those of you who have hope in God and in the Day of Judgment and who remember God very often.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed following the Noble Messenger of Allah is better for you – for one who is confident of Allah and the Last Day, and remembers Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed in the Messenger of Allah you have a good example to follow for him who hopes in Allah and the Last Day, and remembers Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly you have in the Apostle of Allah an excellent exemplar for him who hopes in Allah and the latter day and remembers Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: You have had a good example in God's Messenger for whosoever hopes for God and the Last Day, and remembers God oft.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily in the messenger of Allah ye have a good example for him who looketh unto Allah and the Last Day, and remembereth Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You have indeed in the Prophet of God a good example for those of you who look to God and the Last Day, and remember God always.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly there hath been for you: in the apostle of Allah an excellent pattern for him who hopeth in Allah and the Last Day and remembereth Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: There is certainly a good exemplar for you in the Apostle of Allah—for those who look forward to Allah and the Last Day, and remember Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ye have indeed in the Messenger of Allah a beautiful pattern (of conduct) for any one whose hope is in Allah and the Final Day, and who engages much in the Praise of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed in the Messenger of Allah (Muhammad SAW) you have a good example to follow for him who hopes in (the Meeting with) Allah and the Last Day and remembers Allah much.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In the Messenger of Allah you have a fine example for he who hopes for Allah and the Last Day and remembers Allah abundantly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You have an excellent example in the Messenger of God; for anyone who seeks God and the Last Day, and remembers God frequently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: There has certainly been for you in the Messenger of Allah an excellent pattern for anyone whose hope is in Allah and the Last Day and [who] remembers Allah often.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:21] Verily there is for you a good example (read iswa or uswa) in the Messenger of God, to emulate in combat and in holding one’s ground [therein], for whoever (li-man substitutes for lakum, ‘for you’) hopes for [the encounter with] God, fears Him, and the Last Day, and remembers God often, in contrast to those who do not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily in the Messenger of Allah ye have a good example) a good wont and goodly imitation in staying with him in the Ditch (for him who looketh unto Allah) for he who longs for Allah's bounty and reward; it is also said that this means: for he who fears Allah (and the last Day) and fears the chastisement of the Hereafter, (and remembereth Allah much) with his tongue and heart.
